summary: Just a simple recolour of the Novice Robes in game.
descriptionHtml: It just seemed a bit odd that a mage would be wearing a leather cuirass when all other mages wear robes. This is a replaces the Novice Robes. I wanted it to be it\'s own set of clothing but I am not sure how to do that. If someone wishes to make it so or can tell me how (in the simplest words, I am very new to the modding community :) ) please message me.
author: Kayzie
